name: Veil Enchant
active: Veil: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability (40 second cooldown after being triggered).
tips: Veil EnchantBlock an ability for an allyVeil (Active): Remove disables and crowd control effects from a target allied champion.
If the ally is not affected by any such effects, they gain a 3-second spell shield that blocks the next hostile ability instead.

(60s Cooldown) 500


This enchant instantly removes all crowd control effects from an ally or, if none are present, grants them a spell shield that blocks the next hostile ability.
